description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Preben Thorø - Programmer, Developer & Consultant

ABSTRACT
Internet of Things has never been bigger. And it has never been easier. In this talk, we will learn to program an Arduino board, we will control inputs, outputs, GPS, an basically everything you need to get started.: [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7758

https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference

title: GOTO 2016 • The Ultimate Arduino Bootstrap • Preben Thorø
